short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fix your unproductive meetings and internal communication with Avila's automated end-to-end meeting workflow

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Avila revolutionizes team productivity by using generative AI to streamline meetings and automate project documentation. It is ideal for teams seeking purpose-driven meetings, AI-generated agendas, and contextual knowledge capture. With Avila, meetings become more effective, and teams can have better alignment via automated project repositories. Transform your team's collaboration and productivity with Avila's innovative approach to managing meetings and projects.

The pricing tiers for the tool include:
Basic (Core workflow)
$ 6.00 USD per user / per month
The core Avila workflow to fix your unproductive meetings:
 The Avila meeting workflow
 AI-generated agendas
 Action item tracking
 Project repositories
 Personal and team analytics

Pro (AI-enabled)
$ 30.00 USD per user / per month
Automate every step of your experience using AI. Includes all the features in Basic plus:
 Personal meeting notetaker
 AI-generated contextual summaries
 AI-generated action items
 AI-project status updates
 Advanced customization
